extendedInfo.description: Ho!Ho!Ho! Santa is here with his gifts. This is a funny Santa theme memory game that helps kids training memory ability. Fine the same pictures in the grids. The theme will be changed after every mission completed. Mute music is default setting. You can turn on the music in option. Have fun! :D#Features:   -Good Musics & Pics   -Easy enough for kids   -With touch screen#Keywords:-Memory game!-Cute game!-Cool game!-Funny game!-Great game for kids!!!
